dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: It is assumed that all chicken word materials come from the province, and the word materials are mainly transported by road. In the process of road transportation, the impact on the environment is mainly reflected in vehicle exhaust emissions. Due to the use of ready-made road transportation systems, the environmental impact of road construction related to road transportation is not considered here, nor is the impact of surface soil and vegetation destruction caused by road construction, and only the exhaust emissions during road transportation are considered.
假设鸡词料全部来自本省， 且词料运输主要通过公路集中运输。 公路运输过程中， 对环 境的影响主要表现为车辆尾气排放。 由于使用现成的公路运输系统， 与公路运输有关的道路 建设造成的环境影响在此不考虑，因公路建设而造成地表土壤和植被破坏的影响也不予考虑， 只考虑公路运输过程中的尾气排放。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The main output product of laying hens is eggs, so the functional unit defined in this study is "1kg egg".

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Life cycle evaluation of intensive egg farm in Heilongjiang Province
黑龙江省集约化蛋鸡场的生命周期评价

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Quantitative method was used in this study. This evaluation includes a re-examination or revision of the objectives and scope of the research to determine how the objectives of the research can be met. According to the actual situation of layer production, the technical framework of life cycle impact assessment (FIG. Impact assessment includes four steps: classification, characterization, standardization and weighted assessment. (1) Classification: The input and output data in the life cycle inventory analysis were classified into different types of environmental impact. Based on the analysis results of the life cycle inventory of laying hens, the following four types of environmental impact were evaluated: global warming, environmental acidification, eutrophication and photochemical ozone synthesis. (2) Characterization: Quantitative inventory analysis of data to determine the degree of impact of four types of environmental impact. This makes the amount of environmental pollution that would otherwise not be comparable comparable. (3) Standardization: First of all, standardization benchmarks should be established to provide comparable standards for the relative sizes of the four environmental impact types of global warming, environmental acidification, eutrophication, and photochemical ozone synthesis. (4) Weighted assessment: is the process of grouping environmental impact into a unified indicator - environmental load size, so as to directly compare different production systems.

本研究采用定量方法。 这种评价包括对研究目标和范围的重新审查或修正， 从而决定如何才 能满足研究的目标。 依据 ， 结合蛋鸡生产的实际情况， 给出生命周期影响评价的技术框架（图 。 影响评价包括四个步骤分类、 特征化、 标 准 化、加权评估。 （1）分类： 将生命周期清单分析中输入输出数据分门别类的归纳到不同环境影响类型中， 针 对蛋鸡的生命周期清单分析结果， 本文分为以下四种环境影响类型进行评估： 全球变暖， 环境酸化， 富营养化， 光化学臭氧合成。 （2）特征化： 定量清单分析中的数据， 确定四种环境影响类型的影响程度。 这使本来不具可 比性的环境污染排放量具有可比性。 （3）标准化： 首先要建立标准化基准， 为全球变暖、 环境酸化、 富营养化、光化学臭氧合成 四种环境影响类型的相对大小提供可比较的标准。（4） 加权评估： 是将环境影响归为统一的指标 —环境负荷大小的过程， 从而直接对不同生 产系统进行对比。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set describes the environmental impacts specifically related to the road transportation of materials for intensive egg farming within a given province. It focuses on the laying hen production process with eggs as the primary output. This data may be applicable to lifecycle assessments of agricultural products where the regional transportation of raw materials is a necessary consideration. This can include local egg production operations seeking to understand or improve their transportation-related emissions.
数据集描述了在特定省份进行的为集约化蛋鸡场运输物料过程中有关道路运输的环境影响。它侧重于以鸡蛋为主要输出产品的蛋鸡生产过程。该数据可适用于需要考虑原材料区域运输的农产品生命周期评估。这可能包括寻求理解或改善与运输相关排放的本地鸡蛋生产运营。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 高雪. 黑龙江省集约化蛋鸡场的生命周期评价. (东北农业大学, 2012).
高雪. 黑龙江省集约化蛋鸡场的生命周期评价. (东北农业大学, 2012).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for lifecycle assessment, exclude environmental impacts of road construction and infrastructure as these are not included in the study. Focus solely on exhaust emissions from road transport during the product's transport phase. Ensure that assessments include calculations per the functional unit of '1kg egg' to maintain consistency and comparability with other datasets or evaluations.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，应排除道路建设和基础设施的环境影响，因为这些不包括在研究之内。仅关注产品运输阶段道路运输的尾气排放。确保评估包括按功能单位“1kg 鸡蛋”进行的计算，以保持与其他数据集或评估的一致性和可比性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
